item.title: Welcome to My New Blog: Powered by Hugo and Styled with Congo
item.description: Explore the unique features of my blog powered by Hugo, the benefits of the Congo theme based on Tailwind CSS 3, and the versatility of Markdown functionalities, including Hugo’s shortcodes.
